Package semsim.model.computational

Class Computation

java.lang.Object
semsim.SemSimObject
semsim.model.SemSimComponent
semsim.model.computational.ComputationalModelComponent
semsim.model.computational.Computation
public class Computation
extends ComputationalModelComponent
A Computation represents how the value of a SemSim DataStructure is determined, computationally.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Computation()
    Class constructor with no output(s) specified

    Class constructor that specifies a set of DataStructures that the computation solves
    Computation​(Computation comptocopy)
    Copy constructor
    Computation​(DataStructure output)
    Class constructor with a single DataStructure set as the computation's output
